SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Quitting Smoking
Now Greatly Reduces Serious Risks to Your Health.
augmented_texts: © g g 8 5 Py 8 SURGEON GENERAL ' S WARNING: Quitting Smoke Instantly Greatly Reduces Serious Risks to Your Health.
© g g 8 5 Py 8 operating surgeon GENERAL ' S admonition: Quitting Smoking Now Greatly Reduces Serious Risks to Your Health.
summary: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Quitting Smoking Greatly Reduces Serious Risks to Your Health. Don't smoke. Quit smoking now. It's time to get off your smoking habit. Smoking is a habit that can lead to lung cancer, heart disease, and other health problems.
